title: Coloration of ultraviolet-C-assisted combined desizing-scouring cotton fabric

Desizing and scouring are combined as a sustainable process with the help of UVC to reduce environmental impacts. A saving of 79% time, 71% water and 72% energy of the conventional 2-step process is expected in this research.
